reviews.review: Nunca salio la 3ra parte

Fantastic game. I often find myself playing it when the internet is banned from my house.
My only negative was the maps are a bit on the small side, as with all source games, but then again who am I kidding complaining about a game that's 11 years old.

10/10
Has aged well.

Took me longer to finish this series than Episode One, heartbreaking ending, intense moments, intense battles, sad moments. This game made my feelings get mixed up. Still looking forward to HL3, as this game has a really sad and uncompleted ending. Would surely recommend if you want to continue the story of HL2. :)

This is literally the best Half-Life as a whole has to offer: The graphics are at their finest, the fights are at their most exciting, the humor is at it's most meh, and the story is at it's most mysterious!...

Now if only Episode 3 could come out...

Half Life 2 is no doubt a genre defining game, it's physics engine and animations are something that still hold up. However, the game itself is beyond overrated. It has a reputation that it holds up however its not as good as anyone will say it is, it's a great time waster, something you can finish in a day similar to Portal 2, however its only something you can only enjoy two playthroughs at most without it getting boring. The enemy in the game, the Hunters, are an annoying enemy type, one that is hardly fun to fight unlike the regular soldiers you encounter, and although the sound design in the games are phenominal save for some instances, I will say the the sounds of the Vortigant's calls are . . . unpleasant to say the least.

The only great things I can take away from Half Life 2 are the engine, and the world its based in. The Combine is the best antagonistic force in gaming, something that still fascinates me today, from their iconic look and their characteristic radio chatter. 

I overall don't recommend the game outside of being able to use its textures in Garry's Mod, but that's about it. The game is good, however is not worth the effort to play.

Antes de comenzar quer√≠a avisar que soy un [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/30566290-%C2%ABWeLoveBlu%C2%BB/]"Mentor"[/url] y agradecer√≠a que me siguieras, hago criticas extensas(Hay casos en los que no tanto, por razones especificas), verdaderas y solo analizo juegos que les haya dedicado tiempo.

[h1]Half-Life 2: Episode Two:[/h1]
Por que cuesta tanto escribir una critica a este juego, ¬øes porque tiene una cantidad abrumadora de aspectos de que hablar o de posibilidades?, ¬øporque las rese√±as para su anterior capitulo y juego base funcionan perfectamente aqu√≠?. No es un "Terraria" juego con infinitamente limitadas posibilidades, ya que si nos ponemos serios cualquier juego "libre" esta entre los barrotes del [i]c√≥digo[/i], es una [i]libertad definida[/i]. HL2:E2 sigue desde el ultimo punto donde quedamos, (Puedo criticar que nuestra suerte es comparable a la de un Dios o si quieres puedes venir y buscarle una respuesta mas acorde al universo del juego, ya lo han intentado, [i]"La Teor√≠a de la anomal√≠a cuantica"[/i] es un ejemplo, que este Gordon el que manejas sea el mas suertudos de miles otros Freemans¬¥s que murieron en otros universos). 

[h1]Las cuevas y las hormigas:[/h1]
El primer escenario que disfrutaras en este capitulo es un hormiguero, yo tambi√©n desear√≠a que fueran las peque√±as, pero no. Se introduce un bicho que desmuestra la capacidad del motor para ataques a distancia, yo le bautizo como el [i]"Escupacido"[/i].
Como cualquier otra cosa si le prestas atenci√≥n puedes estudiar y sacar conclusiones, las hormigas tienen un [i]orden social[/i], cada una desarrolla una funci√≥n, ademas de que hay un [i]"l√≠der"[/i]. No se explica bien como se forman los distintos tipos de hormigas, hay un "panal" y larvas, pero ¬øcrece directamente a un [i]"Escupacido"[/i] o con el tiempo toma la forma dependiendo de la necesidad de la colmena?. Creo que me hago preguntas que ni los desarrolladores piensan ,eso me recuerda... a [i]"Five Nights at Freddy's"[/i]?
En general me aburri√≥ bastante esta zona y el logro que la acompa√±a es insano.

[h1]El Enano y zonas posteriores:[/h1]
No criticare cada capitulo dentro de este episodio por separado, algunos no introducen cosas nuevas o pude disfrutarlo poco por culpa del ya mencionado [b]Enano[/b], si eres un [i]completista[/i] ya habr√°s escuchado que hay un logro relacionado con cierto Gnomo que hay que llevar a cierto capitulo final, el problema es que es incomodo, dif√≠cil y que carajo costaba poner un ba√∫l o una repisa para el duende de ceramico, es que no se puede doblar con el auto porque el maldito gnomo sale disparado como un suicida.

[h1]Raptores y Alyx:[/h1]
Quiero hablar de como se nos presentan a los [i]Raptores[/i] y lo que terminan siendo, es muy [i]quisquilloso[/i] pero en un momento son acechadores, √°giles y emboscadores, significan un gran peligro y acaban rapidamente con Alyx y poco despues son unos spamers de alfileres y con una actitud parecida a la "Hormiga Le√≥n Guardiana". 
Me gusto el dise√±o del raptor, pero parecen mucho mas est√°ticos en el enfrentamiento cara a cara.

[h1]Vortigaunts:[/h1]
Al fin se los puede ver a nuestro lado peleando y ayudando, hecho que no se vio cuando la resistencia se levanto el E1, mas bien sus ayudas eran indirectas, colocando equipamiento en los veh√≠culos, √©tc.
Ahora no solo nos salvaran el trasero varias veces, si no tambi√©n con cierto [i]extracto[/i] de hormiga ayudan a curar a Alyx y como en un pasado ella nos acompa√±aba, ahora el nos sigue contento porque ..."no hay mejor compa√±√≠a"... que Freeman¬¥s.
En HL2:E1 se expande el lore de la raza Combine vemos sus instalaciones, maquinaria y tecnolog√≠a, en HL2:E2 se trabaja directamente con los anteriormente esclavizados pero ahora libres Vortigaunts, adem√°s, se expande igualmente el lore de las hormigas, su organizaci√≥n social, √©tc. Con este patr√≥n sobre nueva informaci√≥n relacionada con las diferentes razas me pregunto ¬øque era lo siguiente?.

[h1]Borealis:[/h1]
Aquella primera transmision que vemos en la Ciudadela nos deja con muchas dudas y se la vuelve a ver en este episodio, revelandonos por fin que era aquel lugar, que hacia alli y porque fue. Un lugar que jamas visitaremos gracias a Valve o tal vez...

[h1]Project Borealis:[/h1]
Si, al parecer era donde se centraba el E3, actualmente en desarrollo por unos fans cansados de la espera. En mi opini√≥n el solo hecho que no usen el mismo motor no transmitir√° la misma sensaci√≥n que la saga original, aqu√≠ el link a su  [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk8l6-02Nui9gbdfc1aL6Uw/about] canal de youtube [/url] por si te quieres pasar.

[h1]Fin (por ahora):[/h1]
Llegamos al fin pero solo porque no recuerdo otro aspecto del cual quejarme/criticarme o parlotear, el juego es inmenso ,lo que logro, lo que influyo ,cientos de v√≠deos, wikipedias, etc. Si observas que en esta rese√±a no hablo mucho de los gr√°ficos y los sonidos es por dos cosas, la primera porque yo le doy un tarifazo a los gr√°ficos para llegar a los 30 fps y la otra que aplica perfectamente en este apartado mis otras criticas. Me despido nos vemos en un futuro distante, le doy una puntuaci√≥n de 7,5.

The Saga goes on. If you have played the preceeding games then you will love this. More Combine, More Antlions, More Zombies(and yes the........ Zombines), More Headcrabs(The Poison Ones are still as annoying).
It continues to bring together what is great about this series with its characters, plot and gameplay.
Pick it up and play while the rest of us continue waiting for Episode 3.

Seconda espansione di Half-Life 2, prosegue gli eventi dello stesso e di HL2 Episode 1. Rispetto a questo, la campagna √® pi√π longeva e ancora pi√π interessante. Una parte ricorda addirittura le atmosfere finali del primo Half-Life. Le meccaniche restano invariate, ma si hanno alcuni miglioramenti grafici e, nella parte finale, un tentativo ben riuscito di proporre una mappa molto grande interamente esplorabile, in contrasto con la struttura pi√π "a corridoi" tipica.
Storia e personaggi sempre al top e un po' di frustrazione alla fine, nel sapere che molto probabilmente non giocheremo mai Half-Life 2 Episode 3, o comunque Half-Life 3.
Da giocare assolutamente insieme al gioco principale e ad Episode 1.
Another great sequel. Yet I'm waiting for the third.

Ok. Let me talk about my review.

The ending was sad. (I don't bother spoiling it. You'll have to play the game for yourself to find out the ending)
But the graphics were good.
The story was pretty cool.
Even the weapons and the characters looked awesome.

Still, I would like to know what happens next. I really hope they would release an episode 3. But you never know.

One of my favorites is Gordon Freeman. He totally looked cool in the pictures on the store page.

One more thing, some parts of the game were rather intenese, but I loved the game otherwise.

PROS:

Another great, great and the unfortunate the last Half Life episode

CONS:

Series have "ended" and has left all fans and players questions unanswered. 
You've played the games. You enjoyed it. It's one of the best games around. But those last 10 years, those last fucking 10, years. Those 10 endless sufferings and conspiracy theories years left unanswered and ended up in a letter by the series former writer. Fans have been digging info about the next episode of the Half Life game for a decade and not a single information about the next game, and not even a "yes" or "no". I swear, in my opinion and I will officially say it, Valve is now the worst company in all video games industry. Worse than EA. Do you know what's the last thing we need after the video game company stopped making games after 7 years? A fucking card game. And a bunch of trash indie games next. Unexpected, from a multi-billionaire company, right?

This is where I get a little cranky. So the game is just like the previous two parts before it. Its great, I think that the work they put into this game was fantastic, they did a lot to make me hang onto the edge of my seat with the story. The only problem is that they left us hangin'. I love this game but, if one has spent enough time on the internet then they will most likely find out that the story stops here. We all have hope that the cliff hanger will be resolved that some miracle will happen that tells us what would finally happen to Gordon and crew, but the wait has been long and we are all starting to lose that hope. At this point the hanger doesn't bother me as it once did, I have accepted that it may never be resolved, but don't make that stop you from playing this game as painful as it is, it is history, a piece of game history that should be explored. Try it out and see what the rest of us are talking about...


p.s. Still hoping for "Half-Portal" The Half-Life X Portal crossover. (It would fulfill Valve's Rule of Three Requirement and would add and possibly conclude two major games.)

My personal favourite chapter of the Half Life series.
I first played it with its release on the orange box and replaying it now all these years later in 2018 is so nostalgic and fun.The opening chapters where Freeman ventures into the Antlion hive with the Vortigaunts to acquire the Extract are still some of my most loved moments from the franchise. The Combine Hunters make for such cool and interesting enemies to fight and the ending is still reviting. 
Still hoping for Half Life 2 Episode 3 one-day, even if it is just a fools hope XD

El √∫ltimo juego de Half - Life que Valve nos di√≥. Y que bien que est√° todo en esta saga. 
Decid√≠ escribir lo √∫ltimo sobre Half - Life juntando los dos √∫ltimos episodios, ya que estos son considerablemente m√°s cortos que las entregas principales.

Seconda ed ultima espansione rilasciata di Half Life 2 la quale sposta il setting al di fuori di City 17 dopo il collasso della Cittadella.  Ora Gordon e Alyx devono recarsi a White Forest per porre fine all'imminente arrivo di rinforzi Combine dal portale emesso dalla Cittadella.

Gameplay: Questo secondo contenuto scaricabile ha delle mappe molto pi√π aperte rispetto all'episodio 1  nonch√© un'atmosfera molto pi√π rurale.  I livelli sono molto diversificati e divertenti . Vi sono dei nemici nuovi molto ben fatti ed il comparto grafico √® stato migliorato. Complessivamente ha dei livelli molto superiori rispetto all'episodio 1 in ambito di gameplay. Le sequenze pi√π intense  saranno anche quelle pi√π soddisfacenti una volta completate.

Di trama questo episodio √® realmente fantastico, pregno di colpi di scena incredibili.  Sfortunatamente anche quest'ultima espansione finisce con un cliffhanger il quale  rimarr√† tale in quanto  sono passati ormai 10 anni dal rilascio dell'episodio 2 ed un potenziale episodio 3 o addirittura Half Life 3 √® improbabile , date le circostanze. Ciononostante, queste due espansioni sono ottime .

8/10
